description: ABA Real Estate Experts presents this spacious and independent villa on a 1,200 m² plot located in Colmenarejo, one of the fashionable municipalities for nature lovers just 37 kilometers from Madrid. The main floor opens through a large hall to a living room with fireplace and covered terrace, kitchen with office and exit to the outside, living room, guest toilet and a rest area with three bedrooms with large built-in wardrobes and a bathroom. complete. Through the large hallway on the second floor there is access to the left to a bright 80 m² living room with a fireplace and a hardwood bookcase, and to the right to three very spacious bedrooms, all three with en-suite bathrooms and built-in wardrobes. covered and the main one with a dressing room. The house is completed with a magnificent open-plan and versatile attic currently used as a gym and games room with a full bathroom, and the basement where the laundry area is located, a leisure room with a bar and kitchen, a full bathroom and a garage for two cars. The property is located 10 minutes from the town center, the bus stop, schools, shops and the Carlos III University of Madrid. Colmenarejo has fluid communication by public transport with the surrounding municipalities: Las Rozas, Galapagar, El Escorial, Villalba.. . and, of course, with Madrid through the A-6. The surroundings are a delight for nature lovers since it is located in the foothills of the Sierra de Guadarrama, very close to the Valmayor Reservoir, in an attractive natural environment, for hiking or cycling, within the Regional Park of middle course of the Guadarrama River between holm oak forests and pastures for livestock use.

description: In one of the best residential areas of Colmenarejo and surrounded by nature, is this beautiful detached house with five bedrooms. This property has been designed with comfort and accessibility in mind for everyone, as it is completely adapted for people with reduced mobility. Arriving at the main entrance, you will be greeted by a beautiful garden that surrounds the property, you will enjoy a calm and relaxing atmosphere. The facade of the chalet with modern architecture blends perfectly with the natural environment. Once inside, you will be surprised by the spaciousness and luminosity of the spaces. The hall leads to a spacious living-dining room with large windows that allow a magnificent view of the garden and nature, the decoration and high-quality finishes give it a touch of elegance and warmth. The kitchen is modern and functional, equipped with state-of-the-art appliances. The chalet has five bedrooms, all of them spacious and with fitted wardrobes for optimal storage. The master suite is an oasis of tranquility, with a private bathroom that includes all the necessary facilities for people with reduced mobility with a large and fully adapted shower. In addition to all these amenities, this property includes a wonderful space for well-being and fun. Inside, you will find a spectacular indoor pool, ideal to enjoy throughout the year. The house has a fully equipped gym to stay in shape without having to leave home. Regarding accessibility, this chalet has been carefully designed to ensure that all areas are easily accessible for people with reduced mobility. From access ramps to wide doors, everything has been designed to make daily life more comfortable and safer. In summary, this detached house offers a life in harmony with nature, a privileged location near the university and complete adaptability for people with reduced mobility. It is a unique opportunity to enjoy a luxury home in an exceptional environment.

description: GROVE SERVICIOS INMOBILIARIOS sells a beautiful Detached Villa in one of the best residential areas of Colmenarejo, a beautiful and quiet town in the Sierra de Madrid just 30 minutes from the capital. The house has a constructed area of 227 m2 divided into two floors and distributed in 4 bedrooms (3 of them with a dressing room and one en suite) and 3 bathrooms. Through a large covered front porch of 18 m2, we access the main entrance of the house where we find a hall-hall with a 2-section wardrobe and a storage room under the stairs, which gives access to a kitchen-office of 13 m2. m2 fully equipped (with Fagor brand cherry wood high and low furniture, delivered with hob, oven and extractor hood) has a separate pantry room. Next we have a room or office of 11 m2, a complete exterior bathroom with a shower that also serves as a guest toilet and a large living-dining room of almost 30 m2 through which we access the large rear porch of almost 15 m2. with views of the most open and landscaped part of the plot. On the upper floor there is a beautiful and bright master bedroom of almost 17 m2 with a separate dressing room and a complete exterior en-suite bathroom with travertine marble countertop and double sink, and with a charming 11 m2 terrace for exclusive use. Two other rooms (17 m2 and 12 m2), each also with its own dressing room, will share another large terrace with beautiful views and a complete bathroom with a bathtub, also outside. The heating is underfloor heating throughout the house, with a piped gas boiler in the Saunier Duval kitchen, the windows and doors of the exterior carpentry are made of sliding white PVC, the walls of the entire house are smooth. The plot, which consists of 683 m2 perfectly oriented to the South-Southwest, is completely flat and has a parking area with a metal structure for two vehicles, a kennel, a wooden shed to store garden utensils, a large and open rear area, a barbecue and many and varied native shrubs (thyme, rosemary, rockrose...), as well as various trees, several of which are fruit trees (holm oak, strawberry tree, fig tree, almond tree...). Colmenarejo is a University Village, very close to the Valmayor reservoir and with large areas to practice outdoor sports.Unbeatably located, 30 minutes from Madrid capital, 15 minutes from the A6 and the M50 and M40.15 minutes from Las Rozas, on the M-505 that also connects with El Escorial and on the M-510 you access Valdemorillo and Galapagar.
